alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lincoln County through 800 PM MDT... At 716 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Hugo to 6 miles east of Punkin Center, or along a line extending from 19 miles southeast of Limon to 60 miles north of North La Junta. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boyero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
